resources.string:
This application is designed to make your cooking journey easier and more enjoyable. 

 With our app, you can:
 - Search for any meal recipe with clear step-by-step instructions.
 - Get smart suggestions for random meals when you don’t know what to cook.
 - Discover recipes from different cuisines around the world.
 - Save your favorite meals and revisit them anytime.

 Our goal is to help you explore, cook, and enjoy delicious dishes effortlessly.
